description.value:
You need a thieves' toolkit to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pick a Lock]{Pick Locks} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disable a Device]{Disable Devices} (of some types) using the Thievery skill. An infiltrator thieves' toolkit add a +1 item bonus to checks to Pick Locks and Disable Devices.

If your thieves' toolkit is broken, you can repair it by replacing the lock picks with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Thieves' Toolkit (Infiltrator Picks)]{Replacement Picks} appropriate to your tools; this doesn't require using the Repair action. If you wear your thieves' toolkit, you can draw and replace it as part of the action that uses it.
